page.title: 06Other Faiths in Retford
page.content: Tim and I are{Jehovah's Witnesses},the only ones in the school.Our life is a lot different because it is based on {serving God}. Our meetings are held on Tuesday,Thursday and Sunday.Three groups meet in different houses on Tuesday.We all meet at Kingdom Hall on the other days.People give talks,we sing and pray,and study from books. Kingdom Hall is on Exchange Str. {Elders}and{Ministerial Servants}lead the congregation and also take groups.They have responsibilities towards those in the congregation. The{Theocratic Ministry}school helps those who will go out into the community to preach.Children give talks aswell on all kinds of subjects like :Why is the world in such a state?We{believe}the Bible is{the word {of God}and{applly the council it}gives
